testcase.classname: System should not allow to make updates with invalid credentials
testcase.name: TC01_email_id_cannot_contain_just_digits_or_chars_without_"@"_sign_or_"."_extension
testcase.system-out: Given user on the home page.................................................passed Then click account dropdown.................................................passed Given user on the signin page..............................................passed Given customer enters username..............................................passed Given customer enters password..............................................passed Given click sign in.........................................................passed And click user dropdown.....................................................passed Then customer click user info...............................................passed And click email button......................................................passed And user enters email id "<email>"..........................................passed Then verify system does not accept invalid email address....................passed

testcase.name: TC02 There should not be an option of any other language other than English or Turkish
